message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It is an exceptional opportunity that we believe is worth more than $1,000,000. Given its value to you, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,250,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I acknowledge the value of the product, but $1,250,000 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to purchase it for $900,000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We appreciate your interest in our product. To better align with your budget while still reflecting the value of the product, we propose a revised price of $1,050,000.
Alice, I appreciate the adjusted price, but the gap between our valuations is still significant. To move this forward, I can offer $975,000.

Considering your offer, we've decided to adjust our price slightly to $1,025,000. This reflects a compromise that acknowledges the value you place on the product while allowing us to maintain a reasonable profit margin.
Alice, we're getting closer. To meet you halfway, I'm willing to increase my offer to $1,000,000 even.
